sentence.Network_en: If Darwinian theory works so well, why challenge it?
sentence.Network_cn: 既然达尔文学说已经被证实, 那末为什么还要对它提出挑战 呢 ?

sentence.Network_en: Still another problem with Darwinian theory involves extinction.
sentence.Network_cn: 对达尔文学说所发生的另外一个疑问,则涉及绝种问题.

sentence.Network_en: Also, some of the results of evolution do not match what Darwinian theory would predict.
sentence.Network_cn: 况且, 生物进化上的某些结果同根据达尔文学说来作出的某些预测并不相符.

many may harrumph at such a darwinian interpretation of feminism , and say that it is a circuitous route to a traditional destination .很多人也许不同意达尔文学说对女权主义的这种解释，而且会说，这种解释是传统目标的一种迂回的路线。

Sentence.sentence: But such a Darwinian spirit is beginning to give way as at least a few colleges face up to the graduation gap.
